flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: The big thing here is too keep costs down so lithium ION batteries are out and Sealed Lead Acid are in, at least to start. If it weighs 4-8 pounds so be it its not for backpacking its for camping and places where getting to a wall outlet is awkward or not possible.
lines.text_raw: The big thing here is too keep costs down so lithium ION batteries are out and Sealed Lead Acid are in, at least to start. If it weighs 4-8 pounds so be it its not for backpacking its for camping and places where getting to a wall outlet is awkward or not possible.

guide.summary: I'm building a lower-cost portable High(-ish) capacity Recharge pack for mobile electronics like cameras phones tablets using off the shelf parts and components where weight ans size are NOT the most important aspects of the project.
guide.title: Portable High(-ish) Charge pack for portable electronics
